00251       mesh is destroyed and another one created based on the data stream

00453    void UseTwoLevelState (int use)
00454    {
00455       if (!use && State != Mesh::NORMAL)
00456          SetState (Mesh::NORMAL);
00457       WantTwoLevelState = use;
